# Trabalho_ED
g++ -Wall -pedantic -std=c++11 -g goats.cpp -o goats

executar com utilitario 
valgrind --leak-check=full --show-reachable=yes --track-origins=yes --track-fds=yes --track-origins=yes ./goats <parametros>
